lead_paragraph: Taking Towns THE OPPOSITION -- Forces opposed to the Taliban said they had captured the city of Taliqan, in their second apparent victory in three days, as their leaders reported fresh gains across northern Afghanistan. A1 THE FRONT LINES -- In fighting between the Taliban and the Northern Alliance near the Tajik border, many soldiers appeared to have been killed or wounded, but the front lines remained mostly unmoved. B3
